title: Get your Power BI Report Server Product Key (Minute Monday)
excerpt: In this Minute Monday, Adam shows you how to get your Power BI Report Server product key. This will allow you to install a valid copy of Power BI Report Server.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube -- Snapchat
